author: bago
msg: Extracted the StateAwareProcessorLost from the JamesSpoolManager (part of JAMES-491)

Now StateAwareProcessorList and LinearProcessor are both "MailProcessor" objects and the wiring is configurable via <processorClass>FQCN</processorClass> in the <spoolmanager> block or class="FQCN" as processor attribute.

author: sebor
msg: (_rw_expand, _rw_fmtstringv): Cast char to unsigned char before
passing it to isdigit() in order to prevent undefined behavior

author: cschoett
msg: Moved the o.a.b.c.r.b.webcontext package to o.a.b.c.r.webcontext.  Updated supporting tests and classes.

author: bago
msg: Two steps login in RemoteManagerTest. Sending login+pass before reading answers was occasionally failing.

author: nadiramra
msg: C support fixes/enhancements. Testcases for C bindings.
